channel.title: [PI]Disable a certain prayer when in a location?[PI]
channel.description:
I want to make it so that when a player is in [code]c.inJungle()[/code] it makes it so they can't use Melee prayer for normal prayers or curse prayers [code]9 = defMel[/code] and it sends the message [code]c.sendMessage("You cannot use that prayer in here!");[/code]
how would I do so?

item.title: [PI]Disable a certain prayer when in a location?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

EzioAuditori:

I’ve tried everything and it didn’t work.

Thing is, with programming, you can’t just say “I’ve tried everything!”. There is a method which puts the prayer on. You need to find it first. If this was delta, I’d tell you to check clickingMost.java or something, but you’re on PI so you’ll have to find it yourself. Then just add a condition checking if you’re in that zone or not.
Oh and, you’ll also want to make it like, the only way to get in is by teleporting, because otherwise people might turn the prayer off then move in. If you seal it off, you can add another conditional checking if you have prayers on. If you do have them on, make it send a message to the client then turn the prayers off.

Good luck…

Read full topic
item.source: [PI]Disable a certain prayer when in a location?[PI]
